hints.content:
$\begin{align}
\blue{1+1}&\blue{=4-1}\\
\blue{2}&\blue{=3}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $2$ is not the same as $3$.

$\begin{align}
\purple{2+2}&\purple{=3+0}\\
\purple{4}&\purple{=3}\\
\end{align}$  
This is not true because $4$ is not the same as $3$.

$\begin{align}
\pink{3+3}&\pink{=6+0}\\
\pink{6}&\pink{=6}\\
\end{align}$  
This is true because $6$ is the same as $6$.
